name: Skribble
description: The Skribble API allows businesses and teams of any size to fully integrate the e-signing solution of Skribble with any internal systems, software or SaaS solution.

descriptions.value: The Skribble API allows businesses and teams of any size to fully integrate the e-signing solution of Skribble with any internal systems, software or SaaS solution.
